div.a: Expanding partnerships with community based organizations, funders, agencies, and other community stakeholders

span.title: Strong Start Coalition - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

div.p: Strong Start Coalition expands access to high quality early learning opportunities for all children age 0 to 8 in Santa Clara County.

span.title: Artspiration - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

div.p: Artspiration is the countywide initiative to support arts education for all students in Santa Clara County Schools.

span.title: Civic Engagement in Santa Clara County - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

h2.span: Civic Engagement in Santa Clara County

div.p: Partnering with key community stakeholders to help students and families “learn, engage, and take action” to increase civic literacy and involvement.

span.title: DataZone - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

div.p: DataZone addresses critical issues facing students and families through the effective and timely use of data.

div.a: Improving access to inclusive, equitable, high quality education

span.title: Early Learning Services - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

div.p: Early Learning Services provides continual support to our local community, please contact us as needed.

span.title: Special Education Services - Allows authors to enter rich text content.
Alternative Education - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

div.p: The Alternative Education Department provides educational programs for students under court supervision, and who are expelled or who are deficient in credits and have experienced challenges in matriculation in the traditional school settings. Learn more about Our Vision, Mission, and Service.

span.title: Environmental Education - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

div.p: Environmental Education's Walden West provides hands-on, outdoor school experiences in the environmental sciences for the children of Santa Clara County.
